subject: Re: [Perl 5.8.8 on WinXP] Command line usage
body:
Rob Dixon schreef:

>   perl -e "print qq($_\n) foreach <*>"

which as good as identical to

    perl -wle "print for <*>"

-- 
Affijn, Ruud

"Gewoon is een tijger."

--
